<title level="1" right="Rules">[Skills](/Rules.aspx?ID=1391)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 117 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
In some cases, a template lists one or more skills that should be added to the base creature's skills. The creature gains this skill as a primary or secondary skill, depending on if it has a good associated ability modifier. For example, a creature with a +5 Dexterity modifier that gains the [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) skill should gain it as a primary skill, while a creature with a –1 Dexterity modifier should instead gain Acrobatics as a secondary skill. If the creature already had the skill, increase it to a higher bonus.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
